      • queryStudentPersonalData

        public java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> queryStudentPersonalData(ShibbolethAuth.Token token,
                                                                                      int studentID)
        Description copied from interface: SCRS
        This interface is used for querying student personal data.
        Specified by:
        queryStudentPersonalData in interface SCRS
        Returns:
        Student basic personal data, such as name, id, age, gender, degree, advisor(if applicable), total credits, etc. Empty list will be returned if the query is failed.

      • queryClass

        public java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> queryClass(int courseID,
                                                                        java.lang.String courseName,
                                                                        java.lang.String location,
                                                                        java.lang.String term,
                                                                        java.lang.String department,
                                                                        java.lang.String classType,
                                                                        java.lang.String instructorName)
        Description copied from interface: SCRS
        This interface have several responsibilities: 1. Can be used to perform generic class query; 2. Can be used to perform auto fill out relevant information for the users GUI;
        Specified by:
        queryClass in interface SCRS
        Parameters:
        courseID - can be used by administrator for fast class query
        Returns:
        A list of ArrayList, in the ArrayList, each entry stores one query result in the table property order. E.g in Course Table, the proper order is ID, Name, Credits, etc. so in one entry of ArrayList, it should stores the value in this order, which is ID, Name, Credits, etc. Empty list will be returned if the query is failed.

      • queryStudentRegistrationHistory

                                                                                             int studentID)
        Description copied from interface: SCRS
        This interface is used for querying student registration history
        Specified by:
        queryStudentRegistrationHistory in interface SCRS
        Returns:
        ClassID, ClassName, Registration Time(term), Status(Finished, Dropped), Credits Empty list will be returned if the query is failed.

      • adminEditClass

        public boolean adminEditClass(ShibbolethAuth.Token token,
                              int courseID,
                              java.lang.String courseName,
                              int courseCredits,
                              java.lang.String instructor,
                              java.lang.String firstDay,
                              java.lang.String lastDay,
                              java.lang.String classBeginTime,
                              java.lang.String classEndTime,
                              java.lang.String weekDays,
                              java.lang.String location,
                              java.lang.String type,
                              java.lang.String prerequisite,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              java.lang.String department)
        Description copied from interface: SCRS
        This interface should allow the admin to modify the existed class in the database. The admin can only edit the class's description if at least one student registers this class The admin can edit everything of the class if no one registers it
        Specified by:
        adminEditClass in interface SCRS
        firstDay - The first day of the class in the new semester
        lastDay - The last day of the class in the new semester
        classBeginTime - E.g. 9:00
        classEndTime - E.g. 16:00
        weekDays - E.g. Tu, Fri
        Returns:
        Return true if the operation is successfully, false otherwise
